title: ElSila
author: ElSila
content: Hello guys,I want to introduce to you ScriptStore.xyz Affiliate Program, a digital store selling web scripts.First of all, let me tell you about this affiliate program. You can register as an affiliate on this store, then you will get an unique affiliate URL (tracking code). Using this affiliate URL, you can promote the store or a specific product from the store and every time someone access your affiliate URL and make a purchase, you receive 5% from his order. By example, if "John Doe" access this site thru your affiliate URL and places an order totaling $100, you will receive $5 in your account balance, as soon as his order is confirmed. There are products which costs even $1000 (depending on licensing and extra options, they can go over $10.000), no matter how big the order is, you will always receive 5% of the order. Also, commission percentage can be increased based on performance.You can withdraw your earnings when you have at least $50, by Bank Transfer or Bitcoin. Also, you can use your earning as in-store credit so you can purchase your desired products.Now, if you want to join and try it, it's free and it takes just a minute.You can check ScriptStore Affiliate Program here: https://scriptstore.xyz/affiliate/info
